div.ab: zōt ud rāspīg: Iranian mss.; vid. Recitation Instruction VrS21.3, VVrS21.3.
Y19.1a zōt ud rāspīg, Y19.1b zōt: Kotwal and Boyd.

Commentary.ab: Y19.1a ahura ... aṣ̌āum] Kellens, 2010 p. 28 suggests that the redundancy of the vocative ahura mazda in Y19.1a and Y19.1b is due to a later introduction of this formula in Y19.1a. Influence from the Vidēvdād?
Y9.1a astuuaitinąm aṣ̌āum] add. post. glossa misuuānahe sātauuahe xᵛaδātahe 672; misuuānahe sātuuahe xᵛaδātahe 677.

RecitationInstruction.ab: Y19.1a pərəsat̰ zaraϑuštrō ...] pərəsat̰ OD gywʾk gwptn' frāmraōt̰ (Y20.1) 40.
